com.embeddedunveiled.serial.usb

Class SerialComUSBdevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.usb.SerialComUSBdevice

  • public final class SerialComUSBdevice
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents a USB device with information about it.

    Author:
    Rishi Gupta

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Construct and allocates a new SerialComUSBdevice object with the given details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SerialComUSBdevice

        public SerialComUSBdevice(java.lang.String idVendor,
                  java.lang.String idProduct,
                  java.lang.String serial,
                  java.lang.String product,
                  java.lang.String manufacturer,
                  java.lang.String location)

        Construct and allocates a new SerialComUSBdevice object with the given details.

        Parameters:
        idVendor - USB-IF unique vendor id of this device.
        idProduct - USB product id of this device.
        serial - serial number of this device.
        product - product identifier/description of this device.
        manufacturer - company manufacturing of this device.
        location - location information of this device.
        Throws:
        SerialComException - if the object can not be constructed.

    • Method Detail

      • getVendorID

        public int getVendorID()

        Retrieves the vendor id of the USB device.

        Returns:
        vendor id of the USB device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the USB vendor id hex string can not be converted into numerical representation.

      • getProductID

        public int getProductID()

        Retrieves the product id of the USB device.

        Returns:
        product id of the USB device.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the USB product id hex string can not be converted into numerical representation.
